task_description: I need a way to manage my developent projects. I am having a haerd time detrmining the different states of completion and what needs to be done next. I would like a single pane of glass to see the status of all my projects. The projects can be found in the documents projects folder on my development workstation. this should be have at-a-glance and detail views and maybe even give me a way to move to the project with a button or link.
